part.content: Chapter II : CENTRAL AND STATE BOARDS FOR THE PREVENTION AND CONTROL OF AIR POLLUTION. Sec. 3 - 15.
Chapter III : POWERS AND FUNCTIONS OF BOARDS. Sec. 16 - 18.
Chapter IV : PREVENTION AND CONTROL OF AIR POLLUTION. Sec. 19 - 31A.
Chapter V : FUND, ACCOUNTS AND AUDIT. Sec. 32 - 36.
Chapter VI : PENALTIES AND PROCEDURE. Sec. 37 - 46.
